name: 劉俊麟
objective: 理解機器學習 (Machine Learning) 的理論基礎與原理是重要的，若能掌握機器學習相關之數學基礎，將對機器學習所採行的方法，能進一步了解其原理與局限性等，有助於未來面對新問題時，能有效應用與建構出以機器學習為架構的解決方案。本課程將以兩部份來進行，第一部份以介紹機器學習相關的理論基礎為主包含線性代數 (Linear Algebra)、幾何解析 (Analytic Geometry)、矩陣分解 (Matrix Decomposition)、機率 (Probability) 與最佳化 (Optimization) 等；第二部份則輔以機器學習中具經典代表性之應用案例如線性回歸 (Linear Regression)、維度降低 (Dimension Reduction)、密度估計 (Density Estimation) 和分類 (Classification) 等進行深入的探討與分析。
schedule:
*** Linear Algebra ***
Week1-2: Course Overview, Linear Algebra, Linear Equation, Matrics, Vector Space (Chapter 2)
Week3-4: Analytic Geometry, Inner Product, length & Angle, Orthonormal Basis, Orthogonal Projection (Chapter 3)
Week5-6: Matrix Decomposition, Determine, Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors, Eigendecomposition and Diagonalization (Chapter 4)
Week7: When Models Meet Data (Part II, Chapter 8)
Week8: Dimension Reduction with Principal Component Analysis(PCA) (Part II, Chapter 10)
Week9: Midterm Exam. 

*** Probability ***
Week10-11: Vector Calculus, Partial Differentiation and Gradients (Chapter 5)
Week12-13: Probability & Distributions, Probability Space, Discrete and Continuous Probability (Chapter 6)
Week14-15: Linear Regression, Parameter Estimation, Bayesian Linear Regression (Part II, Chapter 9)

*** Optimization ***
Week16-17: Continuous Optimization, Gradient Descent, Convex Optimization (Chapter 7)
Week18 Final Exam.
